sentences.en: Actually I meant to notify you beforehand.
sentences.cn: 实际上我是想事先通知你的.

sentences.en: He will notify us where we are to meet.
sentences.cn: 他将通知我们在什么地方集合.

sentences.en: I am glad to notify you that your mother has arrived.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴告诉你,你母亲到了.

sentences.en: I don't suppose it occurred to you to notify the police.
sentences.cn: 我看你没想过要去通知警察。

sentences.en: I shall notify you of the arrival of the goods.
sentences.cn: 我将把货物抵达的消息通知你.

sentences.en: In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
sentences.cn: 8月份我们接到通知，说我们的文章不予采用。

sentences.en: Please notify them of the change of the office's address.
sentences.cn: 请把办公地址的更改通知他们.

sentences.en: Please notify us of when you may come here.
sentences.cn: 请通知我们你何时能来这里.

sentences.en: Please notify us when you arrive, so that we'll be ready.
sentences.cn: 请通知我们你们什么时候到达, 以便我们做准备.

sentences.en: She confirmed that she would notify the police and the hospital.
sentences.cn: 她确认说她会通知警方和医院。

sentences.en: Statements with errors could still be going out, but customers who notify us will not be left out of pocket.
sentences.cn: 存在错误的结算单仍有可能发送出去，但告知我们的客户将不会遭受损失。

sentences.en: The skipper notified the coastguard of the tragedy.
sentences.cn: 船长通知了海岸警卫队这一灾难。

sentences.en: We may vary the limit at our discretion and will notify you of any change.
sentences.cn: 我们可能会斟酌改变限额，有任何变动将通知您。

sentences.en: We'll notify her to draw up a contract.
sentences.cn: 我们将通知她草拟一份合同.

sentences.en: We'll notify you where to get it.
sentences.cn: 我们会通知你在什么地方取.

sentences.en: When my guest arrives, please notify me.
sentences.cn: 我的客人到的时候, 请通知我.

sentences.en: You will be notified of any changes in the system.
sentences.cn: 系统中有任何变化都会通知你。

trans.tran_en: to formally or officially tell someone about something
